memberdef.name: ICC_LOG_DEBUG
memberdef.initializer: do { fprintf(stderr, "ICC_DEBUG: [%s:%d] ", __FILE__, __LINE__); fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__); fputc('\n', stderr); } while(0)

memberdef.name: ICC_LOG_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: do { fprintf(stderr, "ICC_ERROR: [%s:%d] ", __FILE__, __LINE__); fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__); fputc('\n', stderr); } while(0)

memberdef.name: ICC_LOG_FLOAT_BITS
memberdef.initializer: do { \ union { float f; uint32_t u; } raw; \ raw.f = static_cast<float>(val); \ ICC_LOG_DEBUG("%s: float=%.8f bits=0x%08x", label, raw.f, raw.u); \ } while(0)

memberdef.name: ICC_LOG_INFO
memberdef.initializer: do { fprintf(stderr, "ICC_INFO: [%s:%d] ", __FILE__, __LINE__); fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__); fputc('\n', stderr); } while(0)

memberdef.name: ICC_LOG_WARNING
memberdef.initializer: do { fprintf(stderr, "ICC_WARN: [%s:%d] ", __FILE__, __LINE__); fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__); fputc('\n', stderr); } while(0)

memberdef.name: ICC_SANITY_CHECK_SIGNATURE
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (((sig) & 0xFF000000) == 0x3F000000) { \ ICC_LOG_WARNING("%s: suspicious signature 0x%08x", \ label, (uint32_t)(sig)); \ assert(false && "Suspicious or uninitialized signature"); \ } \ } while(0)

detaileddescription.para: Contains: Implementation of definitions and macros for ICC signature logging.
